name: TheRecoveryAdvocate
0:
”Alexa, open The Recovery Advocate”
”Alexa, start The Recovery Advocate”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the recovery advocate
des:
Ask or tell Alexa anything from your struggle with or questions about addiction. She will respond with encouragement and give ideas of what you can do to work toward recovery for yourself and your loved ones.
She responds to over 250 variations of questions or statements. Her answers were inspired by what the author felt Jesus might say, but the responses do not involve any spiritual or religiously affiliated directives. We hope this can help you and those you love.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
